notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: R.R. and C.S.W. conceived the study and jointly performed the analysis with input from J.C., T.M.D. and E.J.A. R.R. and T.M.D. performed the computations related to future projections. R.R. and J.C. wrote the manuscript, with assistance from E.J.A., T.M.D. and C.S.W.
